ignore.description: Messages tagged with this will not be processed

all_fields_required.description: Messages tagged with this will have all fields marked as "required":

allow_null_values.description: Messages tagged with this will additionally accept null values for all properties:

enums_as_constants.description: Messages tagged with this will have all nested enums encoded to use constants instead of simple types (supports value annotations):
